scripts.frontend:dev: npm run shared:build && cd ./frontend && npm run dev
scripts.frontend:build: npm run shared:build && cd ./frontend && npm run build
scripts.frontend:lint: npm run shared:build && cd ./frontend && npm run lint
scripts.frontend:preview: npm run shared:build && cd ./frontend && npm run preview
scripts.backend:dev: npm run shared:build && cd ./backend && npm run dev
